quotes.txt: But invader's blood marches through my veins like giant RADIOACTIVE RUBBER PANTS! The pants command me! Do not ignore my veins!
Mmmmmmmm...ahhhhhh! The stink of clean. Another win for the Irken army. Clean, lemony-fresh victory is mine!
There's a pigeon on your head. You've got head pigeons. Get to the nurse before they spread to the other children.

Human law enforcing machine. Markings: Lighty flashy things on top. Defensive capability: minimal. [Police car explodes] Explodes on impact with giant weenie. Evaluation: Pathetic! Pathetic Earth vehicle!
quotes.ep: Attack of the Saucer Morons, S1E5a

quotes.txt:
Dib: What's the matter, Zim? Don't they have rain on your planet?
Zim: Of course! We...oh, such rain we had! Eh...it was...delicious!

Zim: Why was there BACON IN THE SOAP?
Gir: I made it myself!

quotes.ep: Invasion of the Idiot Dog Brain, S1E8a

quotes.txt: But I chose this particular worm hole especially for the occasion. You see, at the end of this wormhole lies: A ROOM with a MOOSE!
quotes.ep: A Room with a Moose, S1E9a

quotes.txt: Children, your performance was miserable. Your parents will all receive phone calls instructing them to love you less now.
He's after our beaver technology! Is this his next evil plan?
If I am elected, Dib's head will be removed and filled with salted nuts!
